welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Baghpat, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and traditions. Enjoy your stay in this captivating city!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for low-cost carriers such as IndiGo, SpiceJet, and GoAir.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles all international flights and some domestic flights for full-service carriers such as Air India and Vistara.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles all international flights and some domestic flights for full-service carriers such as Air India and Vistara.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users need to register with a valid Indian phone number to access it.
